bibl.title: A Ptolemaic Graffito in New York.
bibl.note: Private collection of Prof. Casper J. Kraemer, Jr. Votive offering in elegiac couplets to Pan euagros kai epekoos. Near Redesîeh in Upper Egypt (?), later part of the third cent. B.C. - I. Paneion 8; I. métriques 164.
bibl.seg: Householder Fred W., Jr. and Donald W. Prakken, A Ptolemaic Graffito in New York.

Private collection of Prof. Casper J. Kraemer, Jr. Votive offering in elegiac couplets to Pan euagros kai epekoos. Near Redesîeh in Upper Egypt (?), later part of the third cent. B.C. - I. Paneion 8; I. métriques 164.
